Auxiliar Modules Package

Auxiliar Classes Module

class Node(id: int, lat: float, lon: float)

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representation of a Node.

Parameters

  • id (int) – The id of the node.

  • lat (float) – Latitude component of the geographical point in which the Node is located.

  • lon (float) – Longitude component of the geographical point in which the Node is located.

class Way(id: int, nodes: List[Node])

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representation of a Node.

Parameters

  • id (int) – The id of the way.

  • nodes (List[Node]) – List of nodes contained in the way.

class WaysDictionary(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representation of a dictionary of ways. It is used to store all the ways in the pipeline into a single instance of a Singleton class. It ensures the efficient access to the data by using dedicated methods and data structures.

fill(ways: List[Way])

Fills the WayDictionary with the ways passed as parameter.

Parameters

ways (List[Way]) – List of ways that need to be stored

drop()

Deletes all the data in the WayDictionary instance.

get_way_by_id(way_id: int) → Way

Returns the Way that has the id passed as parameter.

Parameters

way_id (int) – Id of the Way

get_ways_ids() → List[int]

Returns all the ids of the ways stored in the dictionary.

class NodesDictionary(*args, **kwargs)

Bases: object

This is a conceptual class representation of a dictionary of nodes. It is used to store all the nodes in the pipeline into a single instance of a Singleton class. It ensures the efficient access to the data by using dedicated methods and data structures.

fill(nodes: List[Node])

Fills the NodeDictionary with the nodes passed as parameter.

Parameters

nodes (List[Node]) – List of nodes that need to be stored

drop()

Deletes all the data in the NodeDictionary instance.

get_node_by_id(node_id: int) → Node

Returns the Node that has the id passed as parameter.

Parameters

node_id (int) – Id of the Node

Database Queries Module

connect()

Connect to the PostgreSQL database server

connect_to_main_db()

Connect to the PostgreSQL database server

Map Matching Module

overpass_query(query)

Executes a query to the LiRA Overpass server and returns its result.

Parameters

query (str) – Query to execute

get_nodes_and_ways_from_way_ids(way_ids)

Gets OSM Ways and Nodes based on the list of way ids passed as a parameter using the LiRA Overpass server.

Parameters

way_ids (List[int]) – Ids of the ways and its nodes to get.

req_valhalla_service(chunk)

Requests the use of the Valhalla Service which performs the map matching.

Parameters

chunk (List[[float, float, int]]) – Chunk of data points to be map matched.

map_match_chunk(measurements)

Map matches a chunk of measurements.

Parameters

measurements (List[Measurement]) – List of measurements to be map matched.

format_and_map_match_measurements(measurements_from_db)

Formats and separates the measurements from the LiRA database in chunks and map matches them separately.

Parameters

measurements_from_db (List[[]]) – List of measurements to be map matched.

classify_ways(way_ids)

For a set of way ids, it divides it between computed ways that are already stored in the visualization database and not computed ways that need to be inserted for the first time.

Parameters

way_ids (List[int]) – List of way ids to be classified.
